channel.title: Daniel Dae Kim on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Butterfly’ Review: Daniel Dae Kim Is a Superspy Superdad in Amazon’s Blandly Sweet Thriller
item.description: Nine years after faking his own death, a former operative comes out of hiding to save his daughter, now a gifted assassin, in this South Korea-set series.

item.title: ‘Butterfly’ Review: Daniel Dae Kim Is a Superspy Superdad in Amazon’s Blandly Sweet Thriller
item.description: Nine years after faking his own death, a former operative comes out of hiding to save his daughter, now a gifted assassin, in this South Korea-set series.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Review: Netflix’s Surprise Smash Is a Dazzlingly Animated, Infectiously Soundtracked Treat
item.description: Lee Byung-hun and Daniel Dae Kim are among the voice cast for one of the streamer’s most popular originals ever, a Sony-produced musical about a superstar girl group battling an evil boy band.

item.title: Piper Perabo Says There’s Been “Some Discussion” About a ‘Coyote Ugly’ Sequel: “Things Are Moving Around”
item.description: Choosing her words very carefully, the actress tells THR, “People that were integral to making it are in communication about how to do something more.”

item.title: Piper Perabo Says There’s Been “Some Discussion” About a ‘Coyote Ugly’ Sequel: “Things Are Moving Around”
item.description: Choosing her words very carefully, the actress tells THR, “People that were integral to making it are in communication about how to do something more.”
